technical: Explain your experience with the key technologies mentioned in the job description.
How would you approach solving a complex technical problem in this role?
Describe a challenging project you've worked on and how you overcame obstacles.
What programming languages/tools are you most comfortable with and why?
How do you ensure code quality and maintainability in your work?
Have you ever implemented a system from scratch? Describe the process.
Explain the most complex algorithm you’ve implemented and its use case.
How do you debug and troubleshoot technical issues?
What’s your experience with version control systems like Git?
How do you approach writing unit and integration tests?
Explain a time you optimized code for performance or memory usage.
Describe your experience working with APIs (REST, GraphQL, etc.).
What database technologies have you worked with and in what context?
Have you ever conducted code reviews? What do you look for?
How do you stay updated with the latest technologies?
How do you ensure security best practices in your code?
What is your process for documenting technical work?
What CI/CD tools have you used in your projects?
Can you explain the architecture of a recent application you developed?
Describe your experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
behavioral: Tell me about a time when you had to work under pressure. How did you handle it?
Describe a situation where you had to collaborate with a difficult team member.
Give an example of when you had to learn something new quickly for a project.
Tell me about a time you made a mistake. How did you handle it?
Describe a time when you went above and beyond your job responsibilities.
How do you handle constructive criticism?
Describe a situation where you demonstrated leadership.
Tell me about a time you had to manage conflicting priorities.
Have you ever disagreed with a coworker? How did you resolve it?
Describe your ideal work environment and how you contribute to it.
What motivates you to do your best work?
Have you ever dealt with a team conflict? How did you manage it?
Tell me about a time you had to adapt quickly to change.
Describe a time when you helped a colleague improve their performance.
How do you handle stressful or high-pressure situations?
What values are most important to you in a team setting?
Describe a situation where you successfully handled feedback.
Have you ever had to deal with an underperforming team member?
Tell me about a goal you set and achieved.
How do you balance work-life boundaries in a high-demand job?
situational: If you were given a project with an impossible deadline, how would you approach it?
How would you handle a situation where you disagreed with your manager's decision?
What would you do if you discovered a security vulnerability in the system?
How would you prioritize multiple urgent tasks with competing deadlines?
What would you do if you were asked to take on a task outside your expertise?
How would you respond if a stakeholder changed project requirements last minute?
What would you do if you realized you couldn't meet a promised deadline?
How would you deal with a team member who consistently misses deadlines?
If you had to choose between speed and quality, how would you decide?
How would you respond if a client rejected your proposed solution?
What steps would you take if you found a teammate plagiarizing work?
How would you onboard yourself into a completely new codebase?
What would you do if you noticed unethical behavior in the workplace?
How would you handle receiving vague or conflicting project requirements?
What if you were asked to mentor someone more experienced than you?
How would you act if two senior members gave you opposing directives?
If you're stuck with a blocker for too long, what is your action plan?
How would you manage communication in a remote team with time zone gaps?
What would you do if you made a mistake that caused system downtime?
How would you handle a stakeholder asking for constant updates mid-sprint?
role_specific: Why are you interested in this specific role and company?
How do you stay updated with industry trends and technologies?
What do you think are the biggest challenges facing this industry?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years professionally?
How do your skills align with the responsibilities of this role?
What do you know about our company’s mission and products?
Why did you choose this career path?
How would you bring value to our team in your first 90 days?
What excites you the most about this position?
How do you see this role supporting your long-term career goals?
Have you worked in a similar role or domain before?
What are your expectations from this role?
What specific contributions have you made in similar past roles?
How do you handle ambiguity in role responsibilities?
What strengths make you a good fit for this role?
Do you have experience working in our industry sector?
What gaps do you think you need to fill to excel in this position?
What are your salary expectations for this role?
How would you describe your understanding of our product/service?
If hired, what would be your plan for the first week?

How do you delegate tasks effectively?

How do you balance mentorship with project delivery?

What’s your approach to performance reviews?

How do you ensure alignment with company goals?

What metrics do you use to evaluate team performance?

How do you handle feedback from your team members?
What’s your process for strategic planning?
How do you stay objective while making decisions?
What’s the biggest leadership challenge you’ve faced?
